mapper.update: UPDATE program SET employee_no = #{employeeNo}, program_name = #{programName}, program_max_customer = #{programMaxCustomer}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
mapper.select: SELECT program_no AS programNo, employee_no AS employeeNo, program_name AS programName, program_max_customer AS programMaxCustomer, createdate, updatedate FROM program

SELECT p.program_no AS programNo, p.employee_no AS employeeNo, p.program_name AS programName, p.program_max_customer AS programMaxCustomer, p.createdate, p.updatedate,
ed.employee_name AS employeeName, ed.employee_phone AS employeePhone, ed.employee_email AS employeeEmail, ed.employee_gender AS employeeGender
FROM program p INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON p.employee_no = ed.employee_no
WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
